column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Went to Chicago for a weekend trip. Very solid overall experience with the staff
column2: as the bartender downstairs and the server downstairs (not sure what his name was but he had a California surfer vibe) were welcoming
column4: and helpful. The hostesses at the front were a little condescending
column5: but I understand they get asked a million questions a night.
